Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA(1-8)M(1-10) (Synthetic AMPs, hybrid peptide, cecropin A(1-8)+melittin(1-10), Lys-rich, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (90%) toCA(1-8)M(1-12)K:28%; I=V=L=G: 11%.Activity: lethal concentration (LC): active against E. coli D21 (LC 0.5 uM), P. aeruginosa OT97 (LC 3 uM), B. subtilis (LC 0.3 uM), B. megaterium (LC 0.5 uM), S. aureus Cowan 1 (LC 7 uM), and S. pyogenes (LC 0.8 uM).Antimalarial activity:P. falciparum (IC50 4 uM).In vitro toxicity: sheep RBC (LC >600 uM), not hemo.lytic.Structure:  XX.
Literature Information.Author: Andreu D, Ubach J, Boman A, WÃ¥hlin B, Wade D, Merrifield RB, Boman HG. 1992
Literature Information.Title: Shortened cecropin A-melittin hybrids. Significant size reduction retains potent antibiotic activity.
